title: Button, late 18th century
dimensions: L x W x D: 1.8 x 1 cm (11/16 x 3/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Two rectangular mounts in the style of Wedgwood Jasperware; ornamented with love birds, quiver of arrows, torch and leaves; on reverse, music scroll with horns and leaves; white on blue ground.

On card 4

tombstone.epitaph:
Button, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Stoneware. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1925-2-34-a,b.
